wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! When i get a house i'm never ever ever ever going to repaint it, this sucks! Oh well it'll all be over Wed........ OMG! So loooooong! So long in fact that I'm going to bitch and moan about it like a lil baby. THIS SUCKS OMG SUCKS! ARGH! Happy Valentine's Day to: Rocky, Dema, Canaan, Pat, Kyle, and Nick I FUCKING HATE YOU GUYS! (not so much nick b/c he wasn't with the rest of you). Oh and Jess (thought I forgot didn'y you). -mike

I just changed my template so that I can have links and stuff. Do you know what that means? That means show me a cool site and I'll post it under my links. Seriously any site you want ;-)...well maybe not any but a lot.

Ok. My life is a lil on the boring side, but crazy stuff still happens...kinda strange stuff even. As of right this second stuff is good, I have my friends, my music, my bed, my lady friend, and my blog. Simple as that. Sorta. What to say...What to say... I dunno I'm not good at talking "Me and words aren't goodly." (HA! tell me what movie that's from and i'll be surprized). Well as far as my music goes, I listen to it I play it and I try to write it. Most of my attempts at wrinting fail, but I have two good ones. I'm not in a band, but I'm involved in a little side project with Austin, we're called Music in the AM, we have one song...kinda sad but we've only met to write and play under that name once so it's cool. I really want to convince Austin that we should get people to play with us and play at battle of the bands, but I don't think he'll do it. I'm looking to join or start a new band but as of yet I've been rather unsuccessful, so if you have any leads call me or IM me. Fun stuff I guess. Well I'm gonna check out, I'll see you around I guess. -mike

sorry, published b4 i meant to....any way.... download of the day: 'don't stay home' by 311 well today was pretty cool. went by pretty fast considering how bad i wanted to get the fuck outta school. yeah....4th qtr is so close i can taste it hmmmmmm tastes so good. (cept for the exam part but still). "YOU! I WANNA TAKE YOU TO A GAY BAR! I WANNA TAKE YOU TO A GAY BAR! I WANNA TAKE YOU TO A GAY BAR, GAY BAR, GAY BAR! LET'S START A WAR! START A NUCLEAR WAR! AT THE GAY BAR GAY BAR GAY BAR! WEEEOOOOO! AT THE GAY BAR! I'VE GOT SOMETHING TO PUT IN YOU! I'VE GOT SOME TO PUT IN YOU! I'VE GOT SOMETHING TO PUT IN YOU! AT THE GAY BAR GAY BAR GAY BAR! YOU'RE A SUPER STAR! AT THE GAY BAR! YOU'RE A SUPER STAR! AT THE GAY BAR! SUPER STAR!!!!!!!!!"
download of the day: dont stay home

i finialy did it! i finialy took one of my ideas and ran with it. well needless to say aside from sb ending this week has been pretty good. hmmmmmmmmm im bored....let my mind wonder i suppose.....................boob............................. ....hmm pizza.................boob.......oh! qotsa....sweet............boob........... -mike

holy shit no! sb is almost over! arghrgrhhgrh...................... god damn you all i swear i might just have to cut myself monday morning (j/k) but wow this sucks. well i need some alone time ;) -mike

i dont tihnk i've ever hated a friday as much as i do this one...oh well it's been a good break i suppose. tomorrow and sunday i'll be working on stuff i shoulda done much much earlier. damn the world and its people's mindless games! -mike
omg today was soooo sweet! ate some lunch with ash then hung out with the guys and played some dnd wow such geeks....meh -mike

hmmmmmmm spring break a time of much coolness i guess. just saw eternal sunshine of the spotless mind, it was good infact it was for sure teh best movie i've seen all year tied with chasing amy. it probably will hold it's title til i see kill bill v2. truth be told im actually very bored so if at anytime durring break you wanna do soemthing just call me or im me or whatever. i need a date, so if you would like to go on a date with me just tell me and i shall be happy to do so. relationships are very complicated and sometimes i get the feeling that i'm not clear headed enough to handle one but then again if i was clear headed enough were would the challenge be? so in coclussion don't do drugs, don't try to hurt somone on purpose, and stay in school, and you'll be fine or atleast not dead. -mike
argh saw jess's legs, went nuts, well damn so many thins have changed about the way i feel about her in the past week-ish but she still has great legs. -mike

You know how your kinda sorta dating someone but at the same time you're kinda sorta just friends, and that soemone likes soemone else, but for some reason you don't feel like calling it off, and for some reason they haven't called it off...yeah that's confusing. oh well if i just go with the flow everything should work out fine. -mike
YEEEEEEEEEEEEHAAAAAAAAAAW
very interesting few days. very good but very interesting. it'll be fun to see how stuff works out. spring break is almost here only one more day. my brain is already shuting down....

"i wanna make it! i wanna make it witchu." and "the only tihng i know for sure is what i wanna do." hmmmmmmmm.... I think I've found something seriously cool. for more into it visit www.thefade.net the fan site to what i tihnk is one of the greatest bands ever, along with my new hub for discovering countless new bands, since the members are all band whores. yeah seriously good stuff. well my plans kinda fell thru so right now im tryin to hook up with pat along with listening to my crazy stoner rock. fun stuff. qotsa eagles of death metal, mondo gernerator, and of course the desert sessions. good times. just groovin' and chillin'....yeah.......my mind is free of most of my previous burden. i think i'm done with that, unless of course something very cool happens. but i doubt it. i have to find someone else now...i feel kinda shallow considering that im already thinking of other girls. oh well i have a penis what more can i say? (ha ha ha) wow im seeriously pathetic. rollin just to keep on rollin right? yeah you know what i mean. sigh. ths has been a strange good day. -mike

wow this weekend is going to be cool...i think 1)friday night: i'm going over to someone's house trust me...it'll be pretty fun 2) saturday day: i'll try to hook up with someone and jam, or just jam by myself 3) saturday night: i'm either going over to austin's or maybe a party or maybe just chill out with a few people 4) sunday: i have to go to cosi along with doing my articles for ap us....yay

being grounded seriously sucks. no comp and no hanging with friends...oh i have seen hell and it blows. my thoughts on being grounded: i spent most of this weekend in my room listening to deathmeatl alone in my room.....pretty scary stuff man....crazy stuff...next time i'm grounded maybe i'll listen to something less likely to make me want to cut myself (jk).

dl of the day: 'Average joe' by qotsa ok so i haven't had a very good post lately, so i guess i make this one work. Well as afr as stuff goes i can't complain, although i haven't as of yet found a band, aside from the one with jeff. (don't get me wrong, i will love the band with jeff and kc, but i would also like to get involved in a band that might play some of the qotsa songs im interested in). no gf as of yet, although there are some really good prospects, idk if im all that interested in having another gf for while, or atleast til after prom. i know some way im going to get tricked into going...damnit. that's really about it i guess, im kinda bored. -mike

wow so many good things have happened in the past weeek-ish. I ordered the new eagles of death metal album, i found out new qotsa ep comes out april 20th, i got incubus tics, finally got around to buying the vines' cd (very good btw, listening to it right now), i played dnd for 9 hours (dear god i need a life), my bass teacher told me "you really need to find a band to play in, you could totally kick ass if you wanted", and um well i suppose that's it....oh yeah a Georgia Tech better kick some ass and win bc they are going all the way! i hate basket ball btw but my love for any and all college sport out weighs my hate for basketball. -mike

down load of the day: 'drain you' by if you don't know i'll kick you in the face and then make you figure it out. I feel sorry for that little fire hydrant all alone out side in the cold. I bet he misses my trunk. yeah...he probably does. anyway, this weekend was probably better then my whole spring break. lol white castle. lol those drinks were really old. lol 3 hours of sleep. lol good times. damnit i'm really geting sick of the phrase lol. it seriously needs to die, thus i shall stop using it for good. maybe i'll just use ha ha ha or something stupid and pointless like that.

download of the day: 'down' by 311 interesting day to say the least. got a lot of writing done in the past hour. now it's break time. or atleast i wanted it to be break time so now it is break time. -mike

ok saturday was fun i guess. a quick sum up if anyone out there cares. concert was pretty cool, lots of solos, i'd like to say ill do one next year, but im pretty lazy so probably not. after the concert we were talking to people outside and got traped putting stools away. lost her in the crowd, no big deal she was going out with a few friends afterwards so i just came home. now i have an ap us project to do from start to finish in one day. i think i did this to myself last time but atleast i had some research done, and of course this time i don't. here's my plan: research write/copy-ish paper then make a huge timeline and a poster with topics from the paper. it should be as boring if not more boring then my last one. but my last one i got a 60/50 for teaching him something. i tihnk mr. gunka thinks i'm a neat guy, sometimes he talks to me about stuff after school or b4 school. mostly bc i know more about history and politics then a let on and he knows that. it sucks knowing stuff against ur will, damn u father for being a politician, and damn u politcs bc i know somehow im going to get invovled.....shit -mike

ha wow. well things have become ok i suppose. i don't know if i really want to talk about this in a public blog...but i suppose i don't really care that much. ok, so i was thinking of mayby going on a few dates with ash and see how things worked, i even asked her out at prom and at the time she said sure. but she seems really happy with some guy friend of her's, whom she isn't dating. i personnally think they should. yeah well yeah. spoken: I don’t even know what I’m doing here Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Little girl walking down the street Godverdomme*, you gotta be with me Well I know, you know Everybody everyone let’s go Oh, baby, baby, you’re so sweet Ah, ah, wooo Het leven is hard, de mensen worden bang** I’m so old, you’re so young I know, you know Everybody everyone let’s go Oh, baby, baby, you’re so sweet Goddamn, ah, ah, whoa Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Ik denk van ja, maar nee*** Little girl, listen what I say You know, I know Everybody everyone let’s go Oh, baby, baby, you’re so sweet Whoooo Ah, baby, baby, you’re so sweet Goddamn, ah, ah, whoa! *'Godverdomme' = 'Goddamn' (Dutch) **'Het leven is hard, de mensen worden bang' = 'life is hard, people are getting scared' (Dutch) ***'Ik denk van ja, maar nee' = 'I'm thinking yes, but no' (Dutch)

ok guys wow... prom was really really really cool. it was just wow. hmmm well i can't really say anything else except for it was really fun, mostly because my head's spinning from being tired and i'm confused about some things, but it's the good kind of confusion, the kind that keeps you from making a mistake (if that last part made any sense im proud of you). well i can't think of anything else except to say it was probably the most fun i've ever had in a long long time. -mike

hate to say it...but small chance i might also make a xanga. yeah i hate xangas too, they piss me off so god damn much...i just want to kill them. blog's are much cooler...but it's hard to do stuff like put pics in. it kinda bugs me. oh well. ill keep you updated, and of course i'll never kill this site off. it shall become a journal of something specific, idk what, but it will be something. prom should be kick ass. picking up the tux tomorrow. people are giving me all sort of crap about the vest not matching my date's dress. sorry guys but i've been watching james bond movies since the age of 3, anything except for black and white on a tux looks dumb to me. -mike
